person_say: I’m about to give an important presentation, but I’m really nervous. Do you have any tips for relaxation and focus?
animal_say: Oh dear, presentations can be nerve-wracking! I know just the friend to help you chill out—Bruno the bear, a mindfulness expert! Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Yay! I’m excited—Bruno is going to get you feeling all zen and ready to shine! Let’s call him over!
